name: CISCO SOURCEFIRE [HTTP - <%= category %>]
description: This rule looks for suspicious HTTP events detected by Cisco Sourcefire.
query: class=sourcefire [info,description]="high risk" category=["bot nets","spam urls","uncategorized"] NOT [url,domain]:["lowermybills.com","nationalfamily.com"] NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: CISCO SOURCEFIRE [Suspicious Network Traffic]
description: This rule looks for suspicious network traffic events detected by Cisco Sourcefire.
query: class=sourcefire [category,msg]="a network trojan was detected" NOT [category,msg]:["win.adware","pua-adware","win.backdoor.chopper","malicious ssl certificate - odinaff c&c"] NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: CISCO ESTREAMER [Malicious File]
description: This rule looks for malicious Cisco eStreamer file events with the disposition value of 3. Disposition values are described in the page mentioned in the information links.
